meanings.definition: Resembling a fungus in appearance or growth.
meanings.sent1: The fungoid growth on the tree trunk looked strange.
meanings.sent2: The damp, dark environment was perfect for the fungoid to thrive.
meanings.sent3: The fungoid patches on the old bread made it look like a tiny forest.
meanings.sent4: Her unkempt hair was a fungoid mess, spreading wildly in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The fungoid spots on the wall seemed to multiply overnight, like tiny mushrooms.

meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the fungoid under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The fungoid spread rapidly through the damp soil.
meanings.sent3: The fungoid in the garden seemed to have a mind of its own, popping up unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The city was overrun by a fungoid infestation, causing chaos among the residents.
meanings.sent5: The fungoid emitted a musty odor, reminiscent of a damp forest floor.
